attributes.action: ban smoking in cars when children are present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The right to freedom for smokers is far outweighed by the right of a child to their life.

Smokers should no longer be able to abuse children by putting them at risk from potentially fatal diseases; smoking in a car is one of the worst ways to put children at risk from second hand smoke.

Therefore I petition the prime minister to fight for the children of this country, and their human rights.
